head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MELLEN, CONSTANCE L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MELLEN, CONSTANCE L.

block.p: MELLEN-Constance L. On Saturday November 15, 1997 in Washington D.C. Beloved daughter of Frederic W. and Sophie Ross Loudon. Beloved sister of Barbara. Memorial service December 6 at Christ Church, Georgetown, Washington D.C. 1:30PM. In lieu of flowers, memorial donations should be sent to Martha's Table, 2114 14th St NW, Washington D.C. 20009.
